Name: UserAccount
Comment: A user account to create on an Azure Batch node. Tasks may be configured to execute in the security context of the user account.

Key.Name: Name
Key.SummaryComment: The name of the user account.

Key.Name: ElevationLevel
Key.SummaryComment: The elevation level of the user account.
Key.RemarksComment: If omitted, the default is <see cref="Common.ElevationLevel.NonAdmin"/>

Key.Name: Password
Key.SummaryComment: The password for the user account.

Key.Name: LinuxUserConfiguration
Key.SummaryComment: Additional properties used to create a user account on a Linux node.
Key.RemarksComment: This property is ignored if specified on a Windows pool. If not specified, the user is created with the default options.
